glossdef.p: A configuration labeled compatible can be used in a production setup. Nevertheless, ${organization.name} cannot provide full or timely support for a given compatible configuration. ${organization.name} expects no issues with such a configuration and is to date not aware of any particular problem.
The documented restrictions and limitations may be incomplete. Updates on restrictions and limitations are not actively communicated.
${organization.name} is not responsible for any damage caused by using a compatible configuration.
